definitions: 各々[おのおの] (pn) each,you (plural)
english: What to do? Have you lost your way? When that happens, we each have to take a good long look at ourselves.
japanese: どうしたらよいか……道を見失ったか？そういう時は[おのおの]自分を静かにみつめるのじゃ

definitions: 見つめる[みつめる] (v1, vt) to stare at, to gaze at, to look hard at, to watch intently, to fix one's eyes on
english: What to do? Have you lost your way? When that happens, we each have to take a good long look at ourselves.
japanese: どうしたらよいか……道を見失ったか？そういう時はおのおの自分を静かに[みつめる]のじゃ

definitions: 引っかかる[ひっかかる] (v5r, vi) to be caught in, to be stuck in,to stop by, to drop in for a short visit, to be delayed, to take time,to get mixed up in (trouble), to get entangled in (a problem), to be involved with,to fall for (a trick), to be deceived, to be cheated,to be on one's mind, to worry one, to be bothered by, to feel uneasy,to be obstructed, to be hindered,to splash
english: There's always something in the deepest reaches of our hearts. Something buried, or something forgotten.
japanese: 何か忘れているものが……何か心の奥に[ひっかかっ]ているものがあるはずじゃ

definitions: 手元[てもと] (n) at hand, on hand, nearby, close at hand,way of moving one's arms, skill,money at hand, pocket money,grip, handle
english: We're carrying around Huge Materia. This is pretty delicate stuff and we would like to keep it in a safe place…
japanese: 俺たちの[手元]にヒュージマテリアってのがあるんだ。デリケートなものだからどこか静かな場所に……

definitions: 命[いのち] (n) life, life force,lifetime, lifespan,most important thing, foundation, core,paired tattoos of the "life" kanji on the upper arms of a man and woman (indicating unwavering love),fate, destiny, karma
english: Materia is highly dense spiritual energy. A shred of the Planet's life. It should not be used as a weapon.
japanese: マテリアは高密度な精神エネルギー。星の[いのち]のかけらじゃ。武器になどするものではない

definitions: 弱る[よわる] (v5r, vi) to weaken, to grow weak, to wane, to decline (of one's health),to be downcast, to be dejected, to be dispirited,to be troubled, to be at a loss, to be perplexed, to be annoyed
english: We must stop using it… or the Planet will be weakened.
japanese: なんとかやめさせなければ……ただでさえ星が[弱っ]ているのに……

definitions: 投げる[なげる] (v1, vt) to throw, to hurl, to fling, to toss, to cast,to give up, to abandon, to throw away,to cast (a glance, shadow, doubt, etc.)
english: Maximum level command Materia blends with Steal Sense  Throw Morph   Deathblow   Manipulate Mime
japanese: ＭＡＸレベルのコマンドマテリア【ぬすむ】【みやぶる】【[なげる]】【へんか】【ひっさつ】【あやつる】【ものまね】をゆうごうします。

definitions: 合資[ごうし] (n, vs) joint stocks, entering into partnership
合祀[ごうし] (n, vs) enshrining together
郷士[ごうし] (n) country samurai
english: Maximum level command Materia blends with Steal Sense  Throw Morph   Deathblow   Manipulate Mime
japanese: ＭＡＸレベルのコマンドマテリア【ぬすむ】【みやぶる】【なげる】【へんか】【ひっさつ】【あやつる】【ものまね】をゆう[ごうし]ます。

definitions: 失う[うしなう] (v5u, vt) to lose, to part with
english: Maximum level Materia has been lost.
japanese: ＭＡＸレベルのコマンドマテリアは[うしなわ]れ、

definitions: 行う[おこなう] (v5u, vt) to perform, to do, to conduct oneself, to carry out
english: Perform Materia Blend?
japanese: 【マテリアゆうごう】を[おこない]ますか？

definitions: 零[れい] (n, adj-no) zero, nought
english: Received "Bahamut ZERO" Materia!
japanese: バハムート[零]式のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: 捩る[ねじる] (v5r, vt) to screw, to twist,to distort, to parody, to make a pun,to torture, to wrest
攀じる[よじる] (v1) to clamber (up), to scale
english: Just be patient, old man.
japanese: 少しの間、ガマンして[よじっ]ちゃん

definitions: 甲板[かんぱん] (n) deck (of a ship)
甲板[こういた] (n) top board (of a table, counter, etc.), surface
english: Hmm? The deck's up there?
japanese: ん？　上は[甲板]かな？

definitions: 営む[いとなむ] (v5m, vt) to run (a business), to operate, to conduct, to practice (law, medicine, etc.),to carry out, to perform, to lead (a life),to hold (a Buddhist or Shinto ceremony)
english: I can feel the workings of the Planet in the smell of the wind. I also feel the greatness of Man's wisdom and the knowledge in the smell of machinery…
japanese: 風のニオイに星の[いとなみ]を感じ機械のニオイに人間の知恵と知識の素晴らしさを感じる……

definitions: 渦巻く[うずまく] (v5k, vi) to whirl, to eddy, to swirl, to curl (smoke),to be all jumbled together (feelings, thoughts, etc.),to surge, to sweep
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: この部屋に[うずまい]ている古代種の意識はたったひとつのことをうったえているのじゃ

definitions: 訴える[うったえる] (v1, vt) to raise, to bring to (someone's attention),to appeal to (reason, emotions, etc.), to work on (one's emotions), to play on (one's sympathies),to complain,to sue (a person), to take someone to court,to resort to (e.g. arms, violence)
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: この部屋にうずまいている古代種の意識はたったひとつのことを[うったえ]ているのじゃ

definitions: 白魔[はくま] (n) heavy snowfall, white devil
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 究極の[白魔]法ホーリー……メテオと対をなす魔法じゃ。メテオから星を救い出す最後の望み

definitions: 対[たい] (n, conj) opposite, opposition,versus, vs., v.,to (e.g. "winning a game five to three"),equal footing, equal terms,against ..., anti-, toward ..., to ...
対[つい] (ctr) pair, couple, set,antithesis,counter for items that come in pairs,counter for sets (of clothes, small furniture, utensils, etc.)
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 究極の白魔法ホーリー……メテオと[対]をなす魔法じゃ。メテオから星を救い出す最後の望み

definitions: 救い出す[すくいだす] (v5s, vt) to rescue, to free
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 究極の白魔法ホーリー……メテオと対をなす魔法じゃ。メテオから星を[救い出す]最後の望み

definitions: 無くなる[なくなる] (v5r, vi) to be lost (e.g. luggage), to be missing,to be used up, to be run out, to be exhausted, to be consumed, to be reduced to zero, to not occur any more,to disappear (e.g. pain), to be lost (e.g. a dream, confidence)
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 悪しきものは消えて[無くなる]。それだけのことじゃ

definitions: グリーン (adj-na, n) green, environmentally friendly
english: …This is the end.
japanese: ねがいが星にとどくと白マテリアがあわ～い[グリーン]に輝くらしいのじゃ

definitions: 詰る[なじる] (v5r, vt) to rebuke, to scold, to tell off, to find fault, to harp on, to reprove,to question persistently (in order to criticize or find fault with somebody)
english: Wow!
japanese: すごい[なじっ]ちゃん！

definitions: 伊達[だて] (n, adj-na) elegance, dandyism, sophistication, having style,affectation, showing off, putting on an air, appearances, doing something just for show
建て[だて] (suf) indicates storeys, structures, or materials used in a building,indicates denomination (after a currency)

立て[だて] (suf) particularly, especially,indicates the number of horses or oxen drawing a carriage, indicates the number of oars on a boat,indicates the number of movies, plays, etc. comprising a single program, indicates the number of items or methods used
english: I never expected to find a person who could read and understand this difficult writing nowadays.
japanese: やるなジジイ！[だて]に歳くってねえぜ！

definitions: 難解[なんかい] (adj-na, n) difficult to understand, unintelligible, abstruse
english: Really?
japanese: この[難解]な文字を解読できる者が今の時代にいるとはな

definitions: 解読[かいどく] (n, vs) deciphering, decoding
english: Really?
japanese: この難解な文字を[解読]できる者が今の時代にいるとはな

definitions: 老いぼれる[おいぼれる] (v1, vi) to become decrepit, to become senile
english: There's something written in chalk… …(even sunlight can't reach)…(Key)
japanese: でもな、こんな[おいぼれ]でも目は悪くなっておらん。よ～くその文字の下を見てみろい

definitions: チョーク (n, adj-no) chalk,choke,chock
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: [チョーク]でメモがかきなぐってある…………【日の光もとどかぬ】……【カギ】

definitions: 書きなぐる[かきなぐる] (v5r, vt) to scribble (write quickly), to dash off
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: チョークでメモが[かきなぐっ]てある…………【日の光もとどかぬ】……【カギ】

definitions: 試みる[こころみる] (v1, vt) to try, to attempt, to have a go (at something)
english: So this note points to where the key is?
japanese: きっとここを発見した学者が解読を[試み]たあとじゃ……たった二つの単語を解読して力つきたのじゃろう

definitions: 二つ[ふたつ] (num) two
english: So this note points to where the key is?
japanese: きっとここを発見した学者が解読を試みたあとじゃ……たった[二つ]の単語を解読して力つきたのじゃろう

definitions: 単語[たんご] (n, adj-no) word, vocabulary, (usually) single-character word
english: So this note points to where the key is?
japanese: きっとここを発見した学者が解読を試みたあとじゃ……たった二つの[単語]を解読して力つきたのじゃろう

definitions: オルゴール (n) music box
english: What does it mean?
japanese: チョークでメモがかきなぐってある…………【カギを】……【[オルゴール]に】

definitions: 行き詰まる[いきづまる] (v5r) to reach the limits, to come to the end of one's tether
息詰まる[いきづまる] (v5r) to be breathtaking, to be stifling
english: Maybe I'll understand more from the writing and get some new information for you.
japanese: カギが見つかった時、あるいはどうしても[いきづまっ]た時にはここにもどってこい

definitions: 進む[すすむ] (v5m, vi) to advance, to go forward,to precede, to go ahead (of),to make progress, to improve,to deepen, to heighten,to be fast (of a clock), to be ahead,to do of one's own free will
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 解読が[すすみ]新しい事実が判明しているかもしれんからのう

definitions: 事実[じじつ] (n-adv, n) fact, truth, reality
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 解読がすすみ新しい[事実]が判明しているかもしれんからのう

definitions: 判明[はんめい] (n, vs) establishing, proving, ascertaining, identifying, confirming
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: 解読がすすみ新しい事実が[判明]しているかもしれんからのう

definitions: シカト (n, vs) ignoring (somebody), ostracizing, leaving (someone) out
確と[しかと] (adv) certainly, for sure,distinctly, clearly, exactly,firmly, tightly
english: Bugenhagen
japanese: そして何が起こるのかを[しかと]見ておくんじゃ

definitions: 投影[とうえい] (n, vs) projection
english: Look! Look at the image projected on the screen of the water!
japanese: ここはイメージを[投影]するスクリーンだったのじゃ！

definitions: スクリーン (n) screen
english: Look! Look at the image projected on the screen of the water!
japanese: ここはイメージを投影する[スクリーン]だったのじゃ！

definitions: 引き換える[ひきかえる] (v1, vt) to exchange (things), to convert
english: I'm sorry…AERIS. I should have figured this out sooner.
japanese: AERISは俺たちに大きな希望を残してくれた。けれども、それはAERISの命……AERIS自身の未来と[ひきかえ]に……

definitions: 一言[ひとこと] (n, vs) single word, a few words, brief comment
english: That's why it took so long for me to find out… But, AERIS…I understand now.
japanese: ……[一言]も言葉をかわすことなく俺たちの前からいなくなってしまったから……突然だったから、俺は何も考えられなくて……

definitions: 育む[はぐくむ] (v5m, vt) to raise, to bring up, to rear,to cultivate, to foster, to nurture
english: We've gotta take a chance on the hope she left us!
japanese: 大切な人が残してくれた希望……それを[はぐくむ]のが、私たちにできるせいいっぱいのこと……

definitions: 最大限[さいだいげん] (n-adv) maximum,to the maximum degree
english: And, where is that!?
japanese: マテリアの……いや魔晄の力が[最大限]に集中できる場所に……

definitions: ノイズ (n) noise
english: …The noise doesn't go through your ears but directly into your head.
japanese: ……いろいろな[ノイズ]

definitions: もどかしい (adj-i) irritating, irritated, frustrating, vexing, (feeling things are) not quick enough, (feeling) too slow-going, (feeling) impatient, tantalizing, tantalising
english: That's what this is similar to.
japanese: 意味があるようで……何もわからない。何もわからない[もどかし]さ

definitions: パンク (n) puncture, flat tyre (tire), bursting,punk
english: My head feels like it's gettin' crushed!
japanese: 頭が[パンク]しそうなかんじ

definitions: 怪[かい] (n) mystery, wonder
english: It's a strange signal!
japanese: [怪]電波です！

definitions: 電波[でんぱ] (n, adj-na) radio wave, reception, signal,saying strange things
english: It's a strange signal!
japanese: 怪[電波]です！

definitions: コントロール (n, vs) control
english: That was a surprise, the controls went crazy.
japanese: ちょっと驚いて[コントロール]が乱れてしまいました

definitions: 乱れる[みだれる] (v1, vi) to be disordered, to be disarranged, to be disarrayed, to be disheveled, to be dishevelled,to be discomposed, to be upset, to get confused, to be disturbed,to lapse into chaos (due to war, etc.)
english: That was a surprise, the controls went crazy.
japanese: ちょっと驚いてコントロールが[乱れ]てしまいました

definitions: 占む[しむ] (v5m, vt) to occupy, to hold, to command, to account for
使む[しむ] (v5m, aux-v) to make happen (old causative verbal ending)
シム (n) shim
english: This ain't good…
japanese: [しも]たなぁ～……

definitions: ぼりぼり (adv, adv-to) munching, crunching,scratching (an itch)
english: What was that scratching just now!?
japanese: なんですか、今の『[ポリポリ]』ってのは！

definitions: 多少[たしょう] (n) more or less, somewhat, a little, a few, some,amount, quantity
english: …that was for the life of the Planet. Ya gotta expect a few casualties.
japanese: ……星の命のためだったんだ。[多少]の犠牲は仕方なかった

definitions: 出力[しゅつりょく] (n, vs) output (electrical, signal, etc.)
english: …Reeve. It's your job to adjust the reactor's output.
japanese: ……というわけでリーブ君。魔晄炉の[出力]調整は君の仕事だ

definitions: 全開[ぜんかい] (n, vs, adj-no) opening fully,full throttle, full power
english: Once you open it up all the way everything will go full speed!
japanese: 出力[全開]でガーーーーッと行くのよ！

definitions: 付け所[つけどころ] (n) focus of one's attention, what one is looking for
english: The whole idea that Meteor will disappear if we defeat Sephiroth is all wrong!
japanese: セフィロスを倒せばメテオも消えるとは目の[つけどころ]が違いますな！

definitions: 砲弾[ほうだん] (n) shell, cannonball
english: It was my idea to fire Mako powered shells.
japanese: ミッドガルの魔晄炉の力で[砲弾]を飛ばすのは私のアイディアなんだから

definitions: アイデア (n) idea
english: It was my idea to fire Mako powered shells.
japanese: ミッドガルの魔晄炉の力で砲弾を飛ばすのは私の[アイディア]なんだから

definitions: 新兵[しんぺい] (n) new recruit, conscript
english: This new weapon is called…
japanese: この[新兵]器の名前は……

definitions: 器[うつわ] (n) bowl, vessel, container,ability, capacity, calibre, caliber
器[き] (suf) device, instrument,vessel, container
english: This new weapon is called…
japanese: この新兵[器]の名前は……

definitions: 木々[きぎ] (n) (many) trees, every tree, all kinds of trees
english: Look at the withering mountain grass. Listen to the warble of the new born chocobo's.
japanese: 枯れてゆく山の[木々]を見ること。うまれくるチョコボのうぶごえを聞くこと

definitions: 受け継ぐ[うけつぐ] (v5g, vt) to inherit, to succeed, to take over
english: What you will see will eventually become a part of the Lifestream.
japanese: そして、おまえの見たものはやがてライフストリームの一部となり[うけつが]れていくんじゃ

definitions: 河[ホー] (n) discarded tiles, discards
ほう (exp) oh, ho, [object Object],hoo (owl call), toot (sound of a flute)
english: Ho Ho…
japanese: [ホー]ホー……

definitions: 飛び出す[とびだす] (v5s, vi) to jump out, to rush out, to fly out,to appear (suddenly),to protrude, to project,to butt in
english: He told me he couldn't stay still and just zipped out of here!
japanese: じっとしてられないって[とびだし]ていっちゃったよ！
